casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. James J. Johnston (8151)

Dupont, C. J., Foti and Lavery, Js.

Argued January 10 decision released January 18, 1990 John D. Maxwell, for the appellant (defendant). LeonF. Dalbec, Jr., deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, was John T. Redway, state’s attorney, Barbara Hoffman, deputy assistant state’s attorney, and John O Meara, deputy assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
